    • Coatings: Quality Control Monitoring

    Coating Inspection

    Qualitech™ strongly abides with internationally set standards for inspections in the protective coating industry. We offer accurate and quality results with our years of experience in the industry and our inventory of the essential of technologies.

Instruments

  • Elcometer™ 219 Dewmeter
  • Elcometer™ 456 FNF DFT Gage
  • PosiTector™ 200 UT DFT Gage
  • Elcometer™ 224 Surface Profile
  • Elcometer™ 125 Surface Comparator
  • Elcometer™ 112 WFT Gage
  • Elcometer™ 266 Hi-Voltage Holiday Det.
  • Elcometer™ 270 Wet Sponge Pinhole Det.
  • Elcometer™ 214L IR Surface Temp.
  • Elcometer™ 106 Pull Adhesion Tester Sc. 1
  • Elcometer™ 106 Pull Adhesion Tester Sc. 2
  • Elcometer™ 7420 Moisture Tester
